basics.name: Satyam Goyal
basics.label: Computer Science Student
basics.summary: Junior at the University of Michigan, majoring in Computer Science with a strong focus on AI and machine learning.

work.name: Optiwise Inc.
work.summary: Developed reports and databases from customer email data, created a recommendation system, and automated growth and marketing pipelines.
highlights: Enabled execution of efficient marketing campaigns using AWS Lambda functions, SQL, and PowerBI.
Improved user workflow by creating a recommendation system based on GPT4o, LangChain, and RAG.
Boosted sales productivity and cross-functional collaboration with advanced data analysis.

work.name: Harvard Medical School
work.summary: Contributed to an open-source pipeline for microscopic image analysis.
highlights: Decreased patient lab testing turnaround time by automating tasks.
Created quantification modules for post-processed cell images.

work.name: Open CV
work.summary: Published documentation and developed modules for object recognition and medical image processing.
highlights: Made access to state-of-the-art libraries more accessible.

research.summary: Evaluated and benchmarked LLM model performance, developed an open-source dataset, and conducted research on improving LLM performance.
highlights: Evaluating and benchmarking LLM (Claude, GPT, Llama) model performance on multi-modal linguistic tasks.
Developing an open-source dataset of linguistic problems for training and testing transformer models.
Conducted novel research in improving LLM performance on multivariate time-series prediction.

research.summary: Developed and trained a deep learning model for generating color-corrected images to aid colorblind farmers.
highlights: Developed and trained a deep learning Encoder-Decoder model using Tensorflow.
Responsible for machine learning algorithm selection, feature engineering, data generation, and model training, evaluation, optimization, monitoring, and documentation.
Constructed a novel architecture and loss-function to optimize training by 30%.

research.summary: Enabled faster molecular property prediction using large-scale graph neural networks and improved model accuracy with fine-tuning on clathrate crystal structure data.
highlights: Enabled exponentially faster molecular property prediction using large-scale graph neural networks.
Improved model accuracy with fine-tuning on clathrate crystal structure data.

projects.name: Tailored Academic & Resource Assistant (Tara)
projects.summary: Developed an AI-Chatbot for University of Michigan students, providing personalized academic and career guidance.
highlights: Developed an AI-Chatbot using advanced LLM and RAG technologies.
Provided tailored recommendations and support by integrating real-time data on course offerings and student records.
Doubled response quality and decreased costs by 40% using novel semantic chunking methods for efficient data retrieval.

projects.name: Myoga
projects.summary: Built an AI-based virtual yoga instructor to make reliable access to yoga education and feedback widely accessible.
highlights: Tuned posture detection computer vision models for the purpose of yoga pose classification and assessment.
Publication on calculating yoga pose error based on real-time human key points location.
Currently over 3000 users.

clubs.summary: Recruited by the largest tech-consulting group in UC Davis, developed a content generation tool for Optiwise.ai.
highlights: Contracted by Optiwise.ai to develop a content generation tool that uses Natural Language Processing, Generative AI, and Image Processing.
Automated the creation of high-quality content for sellers on Amazon and Walmart.
